document.full_text: the philippines, where an average of 11 women a day die giving birth, could lower its high maternal death rate by having a reproductive health policy, a visiting united nations delegation said on friday.
document.title: philippines needs a reproductive health policy: u.n.
lines_and_colors: the philippines, where an average of 11 women a day die giving birth, could lower its high maternal death rate by having a reproductive health policy, a visiting united nations delegation said on friday.
